revised_title: Mean Free Path of Electrons in Polar Crystals: A Theoretical Study
tldr: This article calculates the mean free path of electrons in polar crystals, focusing on slow electrons in thermal equilibrium. The authors use a theoretical formula to determine the mean free path and compare their results with experimental data from semi-conductors and photo-conductive materials. The study provides insights into the behavior of electrons in polar crystals and their interaction with lattice vibrations.
